attributes.action: Ban Bob Martin from selling pet products
attributes.additional_details:
Please ban Bob Martin from selling pet products as they sell a wide range of death causing and harmful products. There are a wide range of products sold by Bob Martin KILLING and HARMING THOUSANDS of animals including flea and worming treatments both oral and externally ingested along with sprays and flea collars. All products are causing serious harm and deaths.

Moreover even veterinarians warn people not to buy any products from this company. The Bob Martin UK facebook page is full of complaints from customers whose pets have been killed or seriously harmed from using a wide variety of their products cause DEATH, FOAMING AT THE MOUTH, FITTING and SEVERE BURNS. Bob Martin pretend to be concerned with these complaints and blame customers for using the products incorrectly, delete the complaints slowly and ban people who complain.

Please sign and help stop increasing number deaths and harm caused by Bob Martin products.
